body.title: TERMINAL AND GATE
body.heading: Terminal A
body.text:
Gates 101,103,105,107, 109,110,120-129

  • Fly By Checkin
  • Fly By Security
  • Express Bag Drop

body.title: TICKET COUNTER HOURS
body.text:
Monday-Sunday

Opens 120 minutes before first departure

  • All bags must be checked 45 minutes prior to scheduled departure

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area: There are two areas. One is on Level 2 — outside baggage claim. The other is on the air side, but Customers must be escorted by Southwest personnel.

Learn more about Orlando International Airport
